text: Today I learned that my mother was diagnosed with cancer. Her health has been steadily declining for the past few years, but she had a healthy lifestyle otherwise. She presented into the emergency room last week after having severe stomach pain, on and off. After conducting a biopsy, it was determined that she has gastric cancer. The good thing is that it is in a very early stage, so treatment should be fairly simple. Fingers crossed, if the doctors decide to use chemotherapy as a solution, therapy goes well. I guess the good way to think about this issue is that the cancer was detected at an early stage. But it still really sucks to think about my mom having a near-incurable disease. The doctors predict a smooth recovery, so I am praying for that.
